author: Alice Boucher
title: Cyril Lignac "aime l'argent" : démission, embrouilles… la face cachée du chef révélée par ses ex-proches ?
text:
Cyril Lignac “aime l’argent” : démission, embrouilles… la face cachée du chef révélée par ses ex-proches ?
Cyril Lignac est au cœur de nombreuses critiques. D'anciens employés ont témoigné contre le chef cuisinier.
Le chef Cyril Lignac a étendu son pouvoir médiatique et
économique. 280 salariés dans le monde entier
travaillent dans ses commerces de restaurants et de chocolateries.
"En 2004, il avait déjà cette envie énorme de
réussite, ce désir de croquer Paris comme Lucien de
Rubempré dans Illusions perdues." observe Nicolas Chatenier,
son premier agent, dans Télérama.
M6 rêvait d'un candidat "un peu plus rondouillard, comme
les cuisiniers d'antan. À l'époque, les seules émissions
de cuisine qui existaient en France étaient celles
avec Maité ou Robuchon. On jugeait que Cyril ne crevait pas assez
l'écran." se rappelle la productrice. Restos,
pâtisseries, Paris, Londres, Dubaï, à la télé, en librairie, il est
désormais partout. Cyril Lignac a bâti un
empire. Selon Capital, la fortune du
chef cuisinier de M6 est estimée à 10 millions
d'euros en 2020.
Cyril Lignac avide d'argent et de pouvoir ?
Cyril Lignac veille à son indépendance. Selon les informations de Télérama, il a décliné la proposition de M6 de créer un réseau de 170 boulangeries. "Pour lui, un sou est un sou." confie le journaliste culinaire François-Régis Gaudry. L'argent ? Décrit comme "bosseur et rusé" par ses proches, son chiffre d'affaires sur ses restaurants et pâtisseries en 2022 et 2023 irait de 20 à 30 millions d'euros.
Très entouré, Cyril Lignac ne travaille désormais plus avec son
associé de longue date : David Van de Kapelle. La raison ? Ce
dernier a ouvert sa propre brasserie en 2020. "Il y a
des règles. On ne peut pas être à la fois partenaire dans
l'entreprise et avoir son restaurant." explique Cyril
Lignac. "Cyril, si tu ne lui es pas dévoué à 100
%, tu dégages." confie un témoin.
L'ex-compagne de Cyril Lignac veille également au bon
fonctionnement et n'a pas apprécié que Télérama contacte
d'anciens employés.
De nombreux témoignages contre le chef cuisinier
Un documentaire sur Cyril Lignac, diffusé le 9 janvier dernier sur M6, a également vu le propre réalisateur démissionner. "Je voulais le montrer tel qu'il est vraiment. (...) On me demandait de tourner une fiction. Or le documentaire, ce n'est pas du mensonge ni une publicité qui vend la marque. Mes images ont été dévoyées pour faire un publi-reportage au détriment du réel. Cyril Lignac est un homme qui aime la notoriété et l'argent. Il est à la fois l'acteur principal et l'otage de son image." confie le réalisateur, Hervé Martin Delpierre.
Une pâtissière qui travaillait pour lui en banlieue parisienne s'est également confiée à Télérama. "Je ne vais pas vous dresser un portrait élogieux des conditions de travail. (...) C'est une usine, on bosse à la chaîne et en sous-effectif, loin de l'artisanat revendiqué. C'est un management qui ne se remet pas en question. Il faut dire 'oui chef' à tout. Être force de proposition est vécu comme un affront." Et ce n'est pas la seule. "La phrase fétiche, c'était 'Tu fais des heures supp, mais ce n'est pas pour nous : c'est pour toi que tu viens travailler'." confie un ex-salarié qui dit avoir travaillé de 8h à 22h30 5 jours sur 7. Un autre confie qu'on lui a directement dit en arrivant dans son nouveau travail, "'Ce n'est pas comme chez Cyril Lignac ici'. Dans le métier, ça se sait."

author: Nicole Lou
title: Simple Measures Ease Cardiac Strain in 100-Degree Weather
text:
But electric fans were associated with harm in a hot and dry setting In the absence of air conditioning, simple measures proved effective at lowering heat-induced cardiac strain in older people.
Randomized crossover studies showed that electric fans and skin wetting both worked better than no cooling in a hot and humid environment -- and in people with or without coronary artery disease (CAD) -- to reduce the mean change from baseline to hour 3 in rate-pressure product (heart rate multiplied by systolic blood pressure):
Electric fan: -517 bpm x mm Hg (P=0.004)
Skin wetting: -468 bpm x mm Hg (P=0.01)
Fan use plus skin wetting: -750 bpm x mm Hg (P<0.001)
In a very hot and dry environment, however, there was harm observed with fan use. Heat-induced cardiac strain actually increased with fan use relative to controls (+2,139 bpm x mm Hg) and these tests had to be stopped early after 43% of participants started feeling unwell, had a high heart rate, or had abnormal findings on electrocardiography. Notably, this set of experiments was only conducted in people without CAD.
In contrast, skin wetting did manage to reduce the cardiac strain in the very hot and dry environment (-478 bpm x mm Hg), CAD or not, reported Ollie Jay, PhD, of University of Sydney in Australia, and colleagues in a brief correspondence in the New England Journal of Medicine.

author: NL Times
title: Dutch PM hopeful thinks “hatred of Jews” is part of the Muslim culture | NL Times
text: [BBB / Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=38t-I1vRqrc)- License: [All Rights Reserved]() Dutch PM hopeful thinks “hatred of Jews” is part of the Muslim culture According to BBB parliamentarian Mona Keijzer, “Jew hatred is almost part of the culture” in countries where Islam is the dominant religion. The BBB’s “Prime Minister candidate” said that on the talk show Sophie & Jeroen while discussing asylum seekers from Muslim countries. A group of ten lawyers and a historian with a Muslim background have pressed charges of group insult against her. Keijzer was discussing the new PVV, VVD, NSC, and BBB coalition’s “main lines agreement” and the [stricter integration requirements](https://nltimes.nl/2024/05/16/new-coalition-scraps-asylum-distribution-law-sharply-limits-family-reunification) they plan to impose, specifically, teaching immigrants about the Holocaust. According to Keijzer, many asylum seekers come from countries where Islam is the dominant faith. “We know that Jew hatred is almost part of the culture there,” she said. After criticism from the other guests, including writer Arnon Grunberg, Keijzer apologized. But a parliamentarian can’t get away with statements like that so easily, lawyer Reinout Sterk told [NU.nl](https://www.nu.nl/discriminatie/6314101/aangifte-tegen-bbb-kamerlid-mona-keijzer-om-groepsbelediging-moslims.html). He and the other lawyers and historian have submitted their charges to the Public Prosecution Service (OM) in Amsterdam. The declaration states that Keijzer “explicitly and deliberately made a distinction between Muslims and non-Muslims and contributed to the further development of anti-Muslim sentiments in society by suggesting that Muslims are (often) anti-Semitic.” She also “associated Muslims with terrorism” and “used her role as a representative of the people to legitimize that sentiment.” According to Sterk, Muslims in the Netherlands worry that the PVV’s election win legitimizes stigmatizing statements about them and their faith. A new Cabinet [hasn’t even been appointed yet](https://nltimes.nl/2024/05/23/coalition-leaders-meeting-prime-minister-today-5-weeks-put-together-cabinet), and prominent coalition politicians are already making such statements. That has to stop, and that is why they filed charges against Keijzer. As a parliamentarian, she has an additional responsibility to combat divisions and polarization in society, Sterk said. Keijzer was previously [dismissed](https://nltimes.nl/2021/09/25/state-secretary-keijzer-fired-publicly-criticizing-coronavirus-access-pass) from the Rutte III Cabinet for [criticizing coronavirus restrictions](https://nltimes.nl/2021/09/25/state-secretary-economic-affairs-openly-opposes-coronavirus-access-pass). Last year, she [left the CDA](https://nltimes.nl/2023/08/05/former-state-secretary-economic-affairs-mona-keijzer-leaves-cda) and joined the BBB, which presented her as [its Prime Minister candidate](https://nltimes.nl/2023/09/01/bbb-names-mona-keijzer-prime-minister-candidate-fired-rutte-iii-cabinet) ahead of the November elections.

title: Montgomery Mayor Steven Reed signs Executive Order waiving fines and fees for municipal convictions more than 10 years old
text: Montgomery Mayor Steven Reed signs Executive Order waiving fines and fees for municipal convictions more than 10 years old MONTGOMERY, Ala. (WSFA) - If you are a Montgomery resident with unpaid fines you may be eligible for relief in April. This is all part of an executive order signed by Mayor Steven Reed. The executive order signed Thursday cancels certain unpaid fines, fees, and court costs assessed before Jan. 1, 2014. “From our standpoint, it’s not about excusing any behavior, it’s about recognizing that our current system does more harm than good,” said Mayor Reed. This order applies to most non-DUI traffic cases, misdemeanor marijuana offenses, and Class C misdemeanors. In total about 10 million dollars’ worth of fines will be waived. Mayor Reed says this is a new effort to change its approach to criminal justice. “Outstanding fines and fees, and costs associated with this municipal convictions have weighed heavily on individuals and their families. These financial burdens can hinder the ability to find stable housing, secure employment, and rebuilding lives. These initiatives will ensure that the financial burden doesn’t dictate who succeeds and who struggles in our city,” said Reed. Some of those municipal convictions may also have state-related costs which still need to be paid. The mayor hopes the state will follow suit and forgive those as well. Anyone who is eligible to have their municipal costs forgiven will be able to request information from the city about that starting April 5th. Not reading this story on the WSFA News App? title: L'appello di Mattarella per la pace nel 163° anniversario dell'Esercito Italiano
text: [ ](/a/FE77AFCC-AB26-486E-AC9D-F503E95EAFA5/Meloni-sulla-jeep-Crosetto-Informatevi-prima-di-fomentare-l-odio) [Leggi](https://www.liberoquotidiano.it/news/politica/39222999/giorgia-meloni-jeep-guido-crosetto-informatevi-prima-fomentare-odio.html) Sergio Mattarella, presidente della Repubblica, ha espresso preoccupazione per le attuali tensioni internazionali durante un incontro con il capo di Stato Maggiore dell’Esercito e una rappresentanza dell’Esercito, in occasione del 163° anniversario della sua fondazione. Ha sottolineato che viviamo in un'epoca di apprensione imprevedibile, con tensioni internazionali spesso associate a conflitti e guerre regionali alle porte dell’Unione europea. Mattarella ha sottolineato l'importanza di eliminare e rimuovere le minacce alla pace per garantire la tranquillità nel mondo. Ha evidenziato come queste minacce siano manifestazioni evidenti delle tensioni che incombono sulla pace globale. Durante la cerimonia militare per il 163° anniversario della costituzione dell’Esercito Italiano, tenutasi presso l’Ippodromo Militare “Gen. C.A. Pietro Giannattasio” di Tor di Quinto, il generale Masiello ha posto l'accento su cambiamento e innovazione. L'evento ha visto la presenza di numerose personalità di spicco, tra cui il Presidente del Consiglio, Giorgia Meloni, il Ministro della Difesa, On. Guido Crosetto, e il Sottosegretario di Stato alla Difesa, Sen. Gilberto Pichetto, Ministro dell’Ambiente e della Sicurezza Energetica, ha elogiato l'Esercito Italiano nel giorno del suo 163° anniversario. Ha sottolineato come ogni giorno le donne e gli uomini dell’Esercito portino nei più complessi contesti internazionali un contributo unico in termini di professionalità e coraggio, anche a difesa dell’ambiente. Ha concluso affermando che i valori di cui è portatore l’Esercito in ogni sua espressione aiutano a costruire la Pace.
